level.heading: Operating under the influence of alcohol or a drug; watercraft.
level.text: No person shall operate or be in physical control of any watercraft in the District:
While the person is intoxicated; or
While the person is under the influence of alcohol or any drug or any combination thereof.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-266 added this section.
